thread.section_title: 3 West Club - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice historic hotel
thread.title_full: Very nice historic hotel - Review of 3 West Club, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: romlx
title: Very nice historic hotel
text:
Spent a few days which included a winter storm. Location is amazing, next to Rockefeller Plaza and many businesses and restaurants. Room was too warm the first night, but that was solved by contacting the front desk. They sent someone who helped me adjust the heater.
The Hotel is historic, and there is a certain charm to staying here. Bathroom is modern and renovated. Employees are very friendly. Ryan from the front desk, was super nice! Thanks Ryan for making our stay really pleasant. He went out of his way to help us find restaurants around the hotel that were open late hours. And was simply a great guy.
I will definitely keep coming back.
